nodes.text: T'pala paste was a substance with medicinal properties.
T'pala paste was produced by mixing ryll with chuba fungus. It could be used to heal wounds or to treat poisons or disease.
During the time of the Clone Wars, the Twi'lek healer Lumia'Silbossa used t'pala paste to treat injured people in The Enclave, in the place of medpacs, which were difficult for them to obtain.
